com.marklogic.hub.dataservices

Interface ProvenanceService


  • public interface ProvenanceService
    Defines endpoints for viewing and managing provenance documents

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.marklogic.client.SessionState newSessionState()
      Creates an object to track a session for a set of operations that require session state on the database server.
      static ProvenanceService on(com.marklogic.client.DatabaseClient db)
      Creates a ProvenanceService object for executing operations on the database server.
      static ProvenanceService on(com.marklogic.client.DatabaseClient db, com.marklogic.client.io.marker.JSONWriteHandle serviceDeclaration)
      Creates a ProvenanceService object for executing operations on the database server.
      java.io.Reader pruneProvenance(com.marklogic.client.SessionState session, java.io.Reader endpointState, java.io.Reader endpointConstants)
      Prunes provenance according to the retainDuration property provided in endpointConstants.

    • Method Detail

      • on

        static ProvenanceService on(com.marklogic.client.DatabaseClient db)
        Creates a ProvenanceService object for executing operations on the database server. The DatabaseClientFactory class can create the DatabaseClient parameter. A single client object can be used for any number of requests and in multiple threads.
        Parameters:
        db - provides a client for communicating with the database server
        Returns:
        an object for executing database operations

      • on

        static ProvenanceService on(com.marklogic.client.DatabaseClient db,
                            com.marklogic.client.io.marker.JSONWriteHandle serviceDeclaration)
        Creates a ProvenanceService object for executing operations on the database server. The DatabaseClientFactory class can create the DatabaseClient parameter. A single client object can be used for any number of requests and in multiple threads. The service declaration uses a custom implementation of the same service instead of the default implementation of the service by specifying an endpoint directory in the modules database with the implementation. A service.json file with the declaration can be read with FileHandle or a string serialization of the JSON declaration with StringHandle.
        Parameters:
        db - provides a client for communicating with the database server
        serviceDeclaration - substitutes a custom implementation of the service
        Returns:
        an object for executing database operations

      • newSessionState

        com.marklogic.client.SessionState newSessionState()
        Creates an object to track a session for a set of operations that require session state on the database server.
        Returns:
        an object for session state

      • pruneProvenance

        java.io.Reader pruneProvenance(com.marklogic.client.SessionState session,
                               java.io.Reader endpointState,
                               java.io.Reader endpointConstants)
        Prunes provenance according to the retainDuration property provided in endpointConstants.
        Parameters:
        session - provides input
        endpointState - provides input
        endpointConstants - provides input
        Returns:
        as output
